articles.description: Halloween is over, but the terror lives on in the Metaverse
articles.content:
Last week, Mark Zuckerberg and his minions delivered a lengthy, prerecorded presentation on Facebooks mutation
 rebrand into Meta, an umbrella corporation that encompasses all things metaverse and a… [+1804 chars]

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Why flying is so bad and about to get worse - CNN
articles.description: Canceled flights, packed planes, rising fares and violent outbursts are the new normal for air travel. Flying is getting worse for both passengers and crews.
